forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 14C. E winds shifting to S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 57F. E winds shifting to S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
